p.p: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK (previously named SnomedCTUK) that describes a type of Ambulance Request.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Ambulance Request Type subset with subset original id 43951000000135.

p.p: The use of this subset is Advisory, as defined in the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains" document located under the Associated Specifications tab.
